content.text:
[@kas.v2](@RuNxm8SRujPcJx6GjtTQHp6hprAFv5voEkcvoAkB8Pk=.ed25519) 

Sorry to hear that you were #marooned! If you have your old `secret` and `gossip.json` you *may* be able to get your old feed back:

1. Move `~/.ssb` somewhere else for a bit, maybe `.ssb.bak`.
2. Create a new `.ssb` directory.
3. Copy your `secret` and `gossip.json` into that directory.
4. Open a client (or run `sbot server`).

It'll reset your feed to how the rest of the network views your feed, so you'll lose those ~50 posts but you won't have to restart your identity. Welcome back!
